name: Siddharth Rastogi

summary: Key member of core tech team, contributing to the development and maintenance of key features on the consumer website.
Implemented optimization techniques such as INP, TBT, CLS, & LCP to enhance page performance and user experience.
Utilized modern frameworks - React.js/Redux, Typescript to create dynamic and interactive user experiences.
Integrated Node.js APIs with MongoDB for improved data management.
To ensure the company's website is functioning properly for users and customers.
Build, design, & maintain web pages with optimized techniques.
Accomplishes company goals by accepting ownership of new and different features that follows code best practices.
Integrated 3rd party services such as Hubspot, Chillipiper.
Developed reusable components in Site Studio, using JQuery, HTML, SCSS for a consistent user interface.
Took multiple ownership of adding new features & developing dynamic pages using Restful API for the website.

about: Experienced frontend developer with 5 years in software design and development. I focus on high-quality projects, optimizing performance, and user satisfaction. Seeking a challenging role in web development and JavaScript to create innovative and scalable solutions.
